## RTCClient.stopLiveStreamingWithDirect() method

停止单路 CDN 转推

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
stopLiveStreamingWithDirect(config: QNDirectLiveStreamingConfig): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  config | [QNDirectLiveStreamingConfig](./qnrtc-uniapp-sdk.qndirectlivestreamingconfig.md) | 单路转推配置 |

<b>Returns:</b>

void

## Remarks

停止成功会触发 RTCClinetEvent.onStoppedLiveStreaming 回调
